name: Dark Fark Blue
description: this is a combination of Cleaned Up Dark & Dark Fark with a color shift to blue instead of green. It's a total hack so one is just pasted below the other & the hex for the colors altered. works with foobies too.
additional_info:
thanks to both authors see source:
